actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the allocation of employment taxes to the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase the allocation of employment taxes to the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the allocation of employment taxes to the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund.
